1262800.name: Forest Liberation
1262800.description:
Forest Liberation is a simple 2D RPG Adventure, your objective is to liberate the villagers throughout the forest from their vicious rulers, the rogues.
Along the way to liberation, you can speak with them and help them out. Although it is not required.

Some of Forest Liberation's' features include:
  • 3 Huge levels.
  • 4 Different levels of difficulty.
  • A simple way to burn time.

Will you be able to liberate the villagers? Or will you end up like some of them?...
1262800.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
